koohiiStory1: The ancestor worship is so common in Daoist and buddhist countries that you can buy tiny altars to put on the shelves, one for each deceased family member.
koohiiStory2: The urns of ancestors are kept on shelves next to the altar.
words:
お祖父さん(おじいさん): grandfather, male senior-citizen
お祖母さん(おばあさん): grandmother, female senior-citizen
先祖(せんぞ): ancestor
祖先(そせん): ancestor
祖父(そふ): grand father
祖母(そぼ): grand mother
